players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm just as surprised as everyone else about Alice's death. We should discuss calmly and figure out who might be the mafia."
Diana: "Alice's death means one of us three is the mafioso. Bob, your calm reaction seems rehearsed - why aren't you more shocked by a murder?"
Charlie: "I am the detective, and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafioso. We must vote him out to win!"
You: "Charlie's claim seems too convenient. Why reveal now? He could be the mafia framing me to shift suspicion."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, why didn't you investigate Alice instead of Bob? And Bob, your deflection feels defensive - address Charlie's accusation directly."
Charlie: "Diana, I investigated Bob on a hunch, and my detective role confirms he's the mafioso. We can't afford to hesitate—vote him out now to save us."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
